document.full_text: chinese inflation will probably rise more than 5 percent in the year to march, pushing the central bank to raise interest rates, an official newspaper said on tuesday.
document.title: china likely to raise rates if inflation tops 5 percent: report
lines_and_colors: chinese inflation will probably rise more than 5 percent in the year to march, pushing the central bank to raise interest rates, an official newspaper said on tuesday.
